name: cherry
description: A functional scripting language for the Web.

scripts.build: parcel build src/cli.js --target node --out-dir bin --out-file cli.js --no-content-hash --no-source-maps
scripts.build:dev: parcel build src/cli.js --target node --out-dir bin --out-file cli.dev.js --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --no-minify
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:dev

author: Andy Thompson
